title: Hello to my Chinese Viewers and Happy New Year:
description:
I’m making this video to say hi to my viewers and listeners in China, and also to wish them Happy New Year. I was prompted to do so by Ms. Mengjie Ma, a Chinese student studying in Germany, who has worked diligently to translate and subtitle a number of my videos. I have placed links to these in the description of the video.

Mengjie has organized a number of people to work on the translations. They have a group on Weibo: http://bit.ly/2ExqaHn

Thanks, Mengjie. Much appreciated.

I would also like to announce that my new book, 12 Rules for Life, will be translated into Chinese by Beijing Cheers Books (http://bit.ly/2Gn2K49). I don’t know the publication date yet, but will let everyone know as soon as I do know. Links to the publisher are also in the description. 

I am very pleased to hear that my lectures are finding an audience in China.

Bye for now.

Translated Videos: 

On education: http://bit.ly/2C3FTfO
On telling the truth:  http://bit.ly/2CqAQlp
On postmodernism:  http://bit.ly/2Hmvqvz
On Google censorship: http://bit.ly/2ocQnjw 
On women being unhappy: http://bit.ly/2C34cuy
On malevolence: http://bit.ly/2EArK7z
Channel 4 interview: 
http://bit.ly/2GjXYVa
http://bit.ly/2CtJaB2

transcript_parts.text: I am making this video to say hi to my viewers and listeners in China
and also to wish them Happy New Year.
I was prompted to do so by Ms
Meng Jie Ma, a Chinese student studying in Germany, who has worked diligently to translate and subtitle a number of my videos
I've placed links to those in the description of this video
Meng Jie has also organized a number of people to work on the translations
They have a group on Weibo, which I have linked to in the description
I would also like to announce that my new book "12 rules for life" will be translated into Chinese and published by Beijing Cheers books.
I don't know the publication date yet, but I will let everyone know as soon as I do.
Links to the publisher are also in the description.
I am extremely pleased to hear that my lectures are finding an audience in China and Happy New Year to everyone there.
